## SpriteLookup class

Store for sprite positions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class SpriteLookup 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [length](./core.spritelookup.length.md) |  | number | The number of sprites multiplied by 4 (x, y, w, h). |
